title: How do I assign a photo to a contact?
answer:
You can only assign photos to contacts saved in your phone memory.

l   From the **Edit contact** screen:

1.         Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141736160001.png) above the contact name.

2.         From the displayed option menu, choose a photo source, and follow the onscreen instructions to select a photo.

3.         When you are done, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141736647002.png).

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141738220003.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141741382004.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141742943005.jpg)  

l   From **Gallery** or **File Manager**:

1.         In **Gallery** or **File Manager**, open a photo.

2.         Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141742550006.png) > **Set as** > **Contact photo**, select or create a contact, and follow the onscreen instructions to adjust the photo. When you are done, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141742408007.png).

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141743859008.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141744407009.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141745501010.jpg)  

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208141745689011.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
